scenarios.name: Traffic Drop - /product/shoes
scenarios.reason: Correlated drop in GSC clicks (-25%) and GA4 conversions (-42%) starting 2024-11-08

scenarios.name: Opportunity - /blog/seo-guide
scenarios.reason: Impression spike (+125%) with low CTR (1.1%) - opportunity to improve

scenarios.name: Ranking Issue Diagnosis
scenarios.reason: Position dropped from 8.2 to 12.8 correlating with traffic drop

validation_rules.description: Tests should verify structure, not exact strings
checks: Risk insight has severity='high' and metrics.gsc_clicks_change_wow < -20
Opportunity insight has category='opportunity' and metrics.gsc_impressions_change_wow > 50
